name: WRC Official Game of the FIA World Rally Championship
synopsis: From icy roads in Sweden to desert sand in Mexico, experience the World Rally Championship for the first time on Nintendo 3DS. Test your precision and speed on over 60 Super Special Stages drawn from the official courses of the 2014-2015 season! Train in Single Stage mode and play as your favourite driver in Championship mode to unlock Super Special Stages and new, official racing cars! All of the official content of the 2014-2015 WRC season: 13 rallies, 7 teams, 14 drivers, the 4 official manufacturers and all of the associated liveries. Realistic damage to your vehicle in real time. Repair your car between each special race and purchase new, more powerful vehicles.
